name: Pure Soul: The Journey of the Witch Emily
name_original: Pure Soul: The Journey of the Witch Emily
description:
Join Emily on her epic journey in Pure Soul: The Journey of the Witch. As a newly discovered young witch, you must explore a world of fantasy filled with mysteries and adventures. Transform into a witch, magic cat or fairy and face monsters with unique abilities. With challenging and exciting gameplay, you can dodge obstacles, jump over them, and collect potions along the way. Discover the truth about your mother and your magical heritage as you adventure through this enchanting universe.

Soul Mode.

The Cat Transformation.

Little witch Emily using her powers.

Emily human exploring the fantasy world with her bicycle.


Imagine living in a fantasy world as a powerful witch.
Our protagonist was abandoned by her mother when she was just a child, her mother's disappearance was never resolved and is surrounded by mysteries, Embark today on this incredible adventure in search of answers.
